thumb.title: [TAS] N64 Pokémon Snap by CoolHandMike in 20:33.50
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1BYhTxwRIfU以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6442M TAS originally published on 2025-03-19Pokémon Snap is a first person photography spin-off game in the Pokémon franchise. The player is tasked with taking pictures of various Pokémon, either by capturing specific moments on their own or throwing objects to get the Pokémon to do something photogenic.Watch as CoolHandMike ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/CoolHandMike) stares at the ground and sky to avoid lag, while taking high point pictures of Pokémon in record time. -------- NOTE: The camera will sometimes make a few rapid moves that may be nauseating to some viewers.
thumb.last_res_body: 良い天気ッスね ﾜﾝﾀﾞﾎ 爆発ドアップの写... 最速プレイのお約... nice sky. ポリゴン乙 やりかけのオンラ... 全ポケモン捕まえ...
